Software Sustainability Fellowship Application

*Phew* @SoftwareSaved Fellow application submitted with time to spare.

— Alexander Morley (@alex__morley) 9 October 2017

I submitted my application to the Software Sustainability Institute yesterday! You can see my application here - or the full repo on github. And you can find out more about why the SSI is awesome here!
